name: Kitchen
longDesc:
You are in the kitchen.
The pantry is behind a curtain on the north wall.
There is a refrigerator, pulled a bit away from the wall.
There is a counter with a giant sink.
description:
You are in the kitchen.
From the kitchen, you can go to the pantry or to the downstairs hallway.

refrigerator.name: refrigerator
refrigerator.description: This is the refrigerator. It is one of the few normal appliances in the house.
refrigerator.discoveryStatement: That's the screw you need, on the ground behind the fridge!

countertop.name: countertop
countertop.description:
The countertop is made of fake marble. It has a bowl of fruit, a notepad, a phone.
There is large sink that is piled high with dirty dishes.

screw.name: screw
screw.description: The screw is old and has a thin film of some sort of goo on it.

magnet.name: magnet
magnet.description:
This magnet hangs on the refrigerator. It's shaped like a panda and
it's a souvenir from the San Diego Zoo. Your family has a membership there.
